channel.title: Posts on Last Week in Google Cloud

item.title: 2021 Week 7 (~2021-02-15)
item.description:
Featured Releases

BigQuery

  • BigQuery standard SQL queries on Google Cloud Storage data are now supported by cached query results. (February 12, 2021)
    • Docs: Using cached query results

Compute Engine

  • Google Virtual NIC (gVNIC) driver is now generally available. For more information, see Using Google Virtual NIC. (February 12, 2021)
    • Status: GA
    • Docs: Using Google Virtual NIC

Other Release

  • TBD!

item.title: 2021 Week 6 (~2021-02-08)
item.description:
Featured Releases

BigQuery

  • Clustered tables now support the DATETIME type for clustering columns. For more information, see Creating and using clustered tables. This feature is generally available. (January 29, 2021)
    • Status: GA
    • Docs: Creating and using clustered tables

Cloud Workflows

  • Preview: Connectors
    • Status: Preivew
    • Docs
      • Creating and using clustered tables
      • Connectors samples

Network Connectivity Center

  • Launched in Preview
    • Docs: Network Connectivity
    • Posts
      • ja: Network Connectivity Center

Cloud Logging

  • GA: Cloud Logging increased write API call limit

Other Release

  • TBD!

item.title: 2021 Week 5 (~2021-02-01)
item.description:
Featured Releases

Cloud Run (fully managed)

  • Cloud Run now supports WebSockets, HTTP/2 and gRPC streaming. (January 20, 2021)
    • Status: Preivew
    • Docs
      • Invoking with WebSockets
      • Using HTTP/2
      • Using gRPC
    • Posts
      • Official: Introducing WebSockets, HTTP/2 and gRPC bidirectional streams for Cloud Run

Secret Manager

  • Secret Manager Expiration is available for all customers via public preview.(January 28, 2021)
    • Status: Preview
    • Docs
      • Official: Creating and Managing Expiring Secrets

Cloud SQL

  • Query Insights is now generally available. Query Insights helps you detect, diagnose, and prevent query performance problems for Cloud SQL databases. It provides self-service, intuitive monitoring, and diagnostic information that goes beyond detection to help you to identify the root cause of performance problems. (January 28, 2021)

    • Status: GA
    • Docs
      • Overview of Query Insights
    • Posts
      • Official: Database observability for developers: introducing Cloud SQL Insights

Other Release

  • TBD!
